name: Clickeroo
description:
Clickeroo is the latest addictive color tapping game from Smart Software.

Utilizing the smartphone’s touch screen technology, Clickeroo challenges your observation powers and reaction times. This compelling, colorful shapes game will have you addicted in no time as you challenge yourself and watch your points climbing.


Tap on the correct color shape circles, squares, triangles, rectangles to keep moving further, the more you move ahead chances of getting no.1 spot in the leader board increases. This challenge is a race against time as the seconds count down, making it very easy to make a mistake which will send you right back to the beginning.


Clickeroo is fantastic for young and old to play in a spare moment and will motivate the competitive among us to compare scores and aim for more points every time.


Great and creative cool arcade color shape game, lets you experience the feeling of being a professional color switcher. Go on a trip and tap at the color switching circles, triangles, rectangles, squares etc. Avoid the wrong color shapes tiles.

If you had enjoyed playing swiperoo challenges then you will equally enjoy playing clickeroo game.

Enjoy the sound effects, training your reaction ability. Let your finger feel speed and accuracy. Don't touch or tap the wrong color tiles, how fast can you tap! Enjoy different color shapes animations where the colors are switching, swapping, moving up and down, switching colors in reverse direction, jumping and running, twisting.

Don't tap the wrong color tiles! Free to play now!
